text: Poklonyaytes' Allakhu i ne priobshchayte k Nemu sotovarishchey. Delayte dobro roditelyam, rodstvennikam, sirotam, bednyakam, sosedyam iz chisla vashikh rodstvennikov i sosedyam, kotoryye ne yavlyayutsya vashimi rodstvennikami, nakhodyashchimsya ryadom sputnikam, strannikam i nevol'nikam, kotorymi ovladeli vashi desnitsy. Voistinu, Allakh ne lyubit gordetsov i bakhvalov
